text: tatha allaah ne banee israeel se (bhee) drdh vachan liya tha aur unamen baarah pramukh niyukt kar diye the tatha allaah ne kaha tha ki main tumhaare saath hoon, yadi tum namaaj kee sthaapana karate rahe, zakaat dete rahe, mere rasoolon par eemaan (vishvaas) rakhe rahe, unhen samarthan dete rahe tatha allaah ko uttam rn dete rahe. (agar aisa hua) to main avashy tumhen tumhaare paap kshama kar doonga aur tumhen aise svargon mein pravesh doonga, jinamen naharen pravaahit hongee aur tumamen se jo isake pashchaat bhee kufr (avishvaas) karega, (darasal) vah supath[1] se vichalit ho gaya
